subproject.description: Supporting youth participation and involvement in a positive way will offer a renewed sense of civic purpose, disincentives for violent activity, and reduce the risk of renewed violence in Osh and Jalal-Abad. The interventions will also contribute to preparing the ground for a national reconciliation process and peaceful resolution of inter-ethnic tensions through the principles of human rights. It aims to directly contribute to the efforts of the Government of Kyrgyzstan to promote inter-ethnic trust and harmony within the country.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Empowerment of youth for peace
